data.name: SfGantt
data.value: SfGantt (27.2.2) Preview

data.name: SfGantt_Desc_Key
data.value: The EJ2 PowerApps Gantt allows users to track project progress, manage resources, and visualize task relationships in a clear and interactive format. Ideal for project management and planning.

data.name: DataSource
data.value: DataSource

data.name: GanttConfig
data.value: Gantt Config

data.name: GanttConfig_Desc_Key
data.value: The configuration settings for the Gantt component allows you to customize its features and behavior. The dataSource property will be automatically updated based on your data. For refrence, you can find the default configuration in the JSON file located in the "components/gantt/data" folder in the repository.

data.name: EnableDarkMode
data.value: Enable Dark Mode

data.name: EnableDarkMode_Desc_Key
data.value: Toggle this option to switch the application interface to Dark Mode

data.name: AllowFiltering
data.value: Allow Filtering

data.name: AllowFiltering_Desc_Key
data.value: It enables or disables filtering support in Gantt.

data.name: AllowReordering
data.value: Allow Reordering

data.name: AllowReordering_Desc_Key
data.value: If it enables Gantt columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index.

data.name: AllowResizing
data.value: Allow Resizing

data.name: AllowResizing_Desc_Key
data.value: Allows you to Gantt columns to be resized.

data.name: AllowSelection
data.value: Allow Selection

data.name: AllowSelection_Desc_Key
data.value: Allows you to selection of (highlight row) Gantt chart rows by clicking it.

data.name: AllowSorting
data.value: Allow Sorting

data.name: AllowSorting_Desc_Key
data.value: It allows sorting of gantt chart tasks when column header is clicked.

data.name: EnableCriticalPath
data.value: Enable CriticalPath

data.name: EnableCriticalPath_Desc_Key
data.value: It highlights the critical tasks in the Gantt Chart that affect the projectâ€™s end date.

data.name: ShowColumnMenu
data.value: Show ColumnMenu

data.name: ShowColumnMenu_Desc_Key
data.value: Allows you to enable the column menu options in each columns.

data.name: ShowToolbar
data.value: Show Toolbar

data.name: ShowToolbar_Desc_Key
data.value: Allows you to enable the toolbar options in Gantt Chart.

data.name: GridLines
data.value: GridLines

data.name: GridLines_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the mode of grid lines.

data.name: TimeZone
data.value: TimeZone

data.name: TimeZone_Desc_Key
data.value: Assigning specific timezones to schedule dates are calculated as given time zone date value.

data.name: TreeColumnIndex
data.value: Tree ColumnIndex

data.name: TreeColumnIndex_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the expander column index in Grid.

data.name: ViewType
data.value: View Type

data.name: ViewType_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the view type of the Gantt.

data.name: NoDataSource_Message
data.value: There is no data available to display at the moment.

data.name: NoConfigData_Message
data.value: GanttConfig data is required to render the Gantt chart. Please ensure the GanttConfig property is properly configured.

data.name: EventName
data.value: Event Name

data.name: EventName_Desc_Key
data.value: Output event name when OnChange is triggered.

data.name: OnError
data.value: OnError

data.name: OnError_Desc_Key
data.value: Outputs error message when onError is triggered.
